TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SecurityKeyType extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定與安全性權杖關聯的金鑰類型。

span.span: Specifies the type of key that is associated with a security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 列舉型別 (Enumeration)，設定 屬性。Use the enumeration to set the property. BearerKey 欄位搭配屬性。The BearerKey field is used with the property. ### BearerKey 需要 Wsu:Id 或使用訊息認證的傳輸安全性BearerKey Requires Wsu:Id or Transport Security with Message Credentials 在聯合案例中，發行的權杖通常是設定為用戶端和依賴方之間訊息安全性的簽署支援權杖。In federation scenarios, an issued token is generally configured as an endorsing supporting token for message security between a client and the relying parties. 不過，當安全性權杖服務 (STS) 發出的權杖沒有索引鍵 (BearerKey) 時，WCF 將它設定為（WCF 無法背書保證沒有索引鍵） 的支援權杖。However, when a Security Token Service (STS) issues a token with no key (BearerKey), WCF configures it as a supporting token (WCF cannot endorse without a key). 如此一來，發行的權杖必須在簽章中加以參考。This requires the issued token to be referenced in the signature. WCF 目前使用下列：http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd:Id做為參考機制 (wsu: id)。WCF currently uses the following: http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd:Id as a reference mechanism (Wsu:Id). 如果發行的權杖沒有此類屬性，用戶端上就會擲回 以及「要簽署的項目必須具有識別碼」文字。If an issued token does not have such an attribute, on a client, a is thrown with the text "Element to sign must have id". 當使用 SAML 1.1 權杖做為發行的權杖時，就會發生這種情形 (SAML 1.1 規格中並未定義 Wsu:Id)。This happens when a SAML 1.1 token is used as an issued token (the Wsu:Id is not defined in the SAML 1.1 specification). 若要解決這種情況，可能必須使用傳輸安全性使用訊息認證 (例如， ) 或必須加入 STS http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd:Id (wsu: id) 至發行的權杖。To work around this situation, either use transport security with message credentials (for example, ) or an STS must add the http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd:Id (Wsu:Id) to the issued token. 請注意，如果 Wsu:Id 加入至 SAML 1.1 權杖，產生的 XML 就不符合 SAML 1.1 規格。Note that if the Wsu:Id is added to a SAML 1.1 token, the resulting XML does not comply to the SAML 1.1 specification. 替代方式是將 Wsu:Id 加入至加密發行權杖後所產生的 `EncryptedData`。The alternative is to add a Wsu:Id to the `EncryptedData` which is a result of encrypting the issued token. 這個程序符合 SAML 1.1 規格，因為 `EncryptedData` 項目支援 Wsu:Id 屬性。This procedure complies with the SAML 1.1 specification, because the `EncryptedData` element supports the Wsu:Id attribute. 因此，為了符合規格，持有人權杖必須使用 STS 來加密。So to be compliant with the specification, the bearer token must be encrypted by the STS.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyType AsymmetricKey = int32(1)

summary.span: 指定金鑰為非對稱金鑰。

span.span: Specifies that the key is an asymmetric key.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyType BearerKey = int32(2)

summary.span: 指定安全性權杖未包含所有權證明金鑰。

span.span: Specifies that the security token does not contain a proof-of-possession key.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyType SymmetricKey = int32(0)

span.span: Specifies that the key is a symmetric key.
